text: Marco and the Pirates (original title: Marco Macaco) is a 2012 danish computer-animated movie directed by Jan Rahbek. The film was produced by Nice Ninja Productions and distributed by SF Film. Marco and the Pirates was released in Denmark on 11 October 2012. == Voice cast == * Peter Fr√∂din as Marco Macaco * Mille Lehfeldt as Lulu * Rune Tolsgaard as Carlo == Other websites == * * * * Category:Danish movies Category:2012 animated movies Category:Movies about animals Category:Robot movies
title: Marco and the Pirates
